posts.post_content:
Hi.  I've decided to put together a Buffalo team set without regard to back.  I'm early in my T206 quest and it seems like a goal I can reach and get a sense of accomplishment early on.  :)

I currently have 5 of the 11.  I would like to purchase any of the others in raw, low-grade condition.  Please feel free to send images and asking prices via PM or email.  I'm fine with PWE shipping for single cards.

Needed:

Brain
Burchell
Clancy
Flanagan
Malarkey
Taylor

Thanks in advance.

Tommy
Bump.  Still looking for Buffalo players.  Thanks to those who have reached out.
